_header: O blessed Lord how may this be
_description: A loving mistress complains of her heaviness — one 5-line stanza (abbcc)

BLAdd5665.Transcription:
O blessed lord how may this beThat Y am thus in hevinessAnd yet
                    Y have do my besynesseEver to plese hym with all my myghthBothe erly
                    late by day and by nyghth
